entry.content: We have joined the twenty-first century. Come follow the lab on twitter @BenMatthewsUBC!

entry.title: Welcome to the (Ben) Matthews Lab!
entry.content:
Welcome to the new home of the (Ben) Matthews lab in the Department of Zoology at the University of British Columbia. The physical doors will open in September, but we are here now.

Of note: there are two Matthews labs in the department, and, quite confusingly, we both work on insects. If youâ€™re looking for the original Matthews Lab (Phil Matthews) at UBC Zoology, you can find his website here.
entry.summary: Welcome to the new home of the (Ben) Matthews lab in the Department of Zoology at the University of British Columbia. The physical doors will open in September, but we are here now.
